content.body: Anyone here signed up for bsky.app? I'm @annevk.nl.

:target and text fragments only work for the first page load if the element or text is available before onload. If the content is created from a `fetch()` + script, that can happen after onload. Should we have an explicit API to delay the load event, or to go "try again now to hash-navigate" ?
content.formatted_body: :target and text fragments only work for the first page load if the element or text is available before onload. If the content is created from a fetch() + script, that can happen after onload. Should we have an explicit API to delay the load event, or to go "try again now to hash-navigate" ?
